actions.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 5, 6, 8, 12, 13, 16, 17, 18, 19, 21, 22, 26, 29, 45, 61, 63, and 64 printed in House Report 111-182.
purpose: An amendment comprised of the list of amendments submitted by the Chairman offered en bloc: amendments numbered 5,6,8,12,13,16,17,18, 19,21,22,26,29,45,61,63, and 64 printed in House Report 111-182.
